meanings.sent1: The zookeeper fed the pachyderms their favorite fruits.
meanings.sent2: In the savanna, pachyderms roam freely under the hot sun.
meanings.sent3: The pachyderms had a playful mud fight in the enclosure.
meanings.sent4: Her boss was a pachyderm, never showing any emotions.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the size of the pachyderms at the sanctuary.

meanings.definition: Group of thick-skinned animals, such as elephants and rhinoceroses
meanings.sent1: A herd of pachyderms gathered near the watering hole.
meanings.sent2: Tourists were excited to see the majestic pachyderms up close.
meanings.sent3: The pachyderms seemed to be having a serious discussion in their own language.
meanings.sent4: The team worked together like a group of pachyderms, strong and united.
meanings.sent5: The ancient drawings depicted battles between warriors and fierce pachyderms.
